text: Shri Khushal Das University (SKDU and SKD University) is an Indian Private university located in Hanumangarh, Rajasthan. It was established after the Rajasthan's assembly passed the Shri Khushal Das University, Pilibanga Bill, 2018. ==Faculty== Name Born Introduction Ref Spouse Nationality Javed Khan King 10 January 1999 hanumangarh, Rajasthan, India Professor Emeritus Islamic Studies, javed Khan King (born 10 January 1999) is an Indian History and producer who appears in History. Yes Indian ==References== ==External links== * Category:Private universities in Rajasthan Category:2018 establishments in Rajasthan Category:Universities and colleges established in 2018
title: Shri Khushan Das University
